oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: !nanni (XI)
Tamme (XII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The !kun do not 'throw away' their old people, but keep them with them. The old people take care of the small children when the mothers are off collecting food. 1) This story is found in Book XI & XII-10.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Treatment of the old
